name: Horse Divorce - GMTK Game Jam 2021
description:
Horse Divorce is a puzzle game about two horses trying to overcome their elongated differences to meet in the middle. Players will have control over one horse half at a time to navigate around the level, move obstacles, and make two horse ends smooch!

This game was developed in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, where the theme was "Joined Together."

This game is playable in your browser!

Developed by:

Programming and Level Design:

Peyton Lee

Neha Nagvekar

Animation and Assets:

Matt Grinnell

Claire Kim

Music and SFX:

Yerin Yang
